name: Daily 100 Rep Kettlebell Routine
description: 100 reps of each exercise, daily. Six kettlebell exercises targeting core stability, obliques, shoulders, glutes, arms, and back. Challenge-style high-volume routine with before/after posture comparisons.

exercises.name: Kettlebell Around-the-Body Pass
exercises.description: Pass KB around your hips/body hand to hand. Alternate directions.

exercises.name: Kettlebell Side Swing
exercises.description: Swing KB side to side across the body using core rotation.

exercises.name: Kettlebell Upright Row
exercises.description: Pull KB up close to body, elbows high, shrug at top. No hip snap.

exercises.name: Kettlebell Swing
exercises.description: Standard two-handed swing to chest height.

exercises.name: Kettlebell Triceps Extension
exercises.description: Hold KB overhead, lower behind head, extend.

exercises.name: Kettlebell Bent-Over Horn Row
exercises.description: Both hands on horns, bent over, row to hips and extend arms.
exercises.notes: Stay bent over entire time. Back builder.

circuit.notes: Do daily. Break 100 reps into sets as needed (e.g., 4x25, 5x20). Use a light kettlebell.

raw.transcript: If you do 100 kettlebell halos every day, your core stability will get stronger and stronger. If you do 100 kettlebell side swings every day, You won't have any fat on your obliques. If you do a hundred kettlebell high pulls every day, You'll Get Beautiful Straight Shoulders. If You Do A Hundred Kettlebell Swings Every Day Your Glutes Will Become Fuller And Round. Or If You Do A Hundred Kettlebell Triceps Extensions Every Day Your Arm Definition Will Be More Prominent. If You Do A Hundred Kettlebell Rows Every Day Your Back Will Become More Upright.
raw.caption: Do 100 reps daily. Start changing your life today
raw.visualSummary: Muscular man in gym demonstrates exercises with 3D muscle models highlighting targeted areas, before/after posture comparisons, and flame icons.
